text: Katherine Whitton "Kathy" Baker (born June 8, 1950) is an American movie and television actress. She acted in the movies Edward Scissorhands, The Cider House Rules and Cold Mountain. She also acted in the TV series Picket Fences and Boston Public. She was born in Midland, Texas. title: Kathy Baker
